GK19gu05-06u:572: [1] atha śrī-govinda-kṛtam ahasi vrajendra-sadasi prātaḥ-kathā prathām āpa /
GK19gu05-06u:576: pratilavam api śravasi vṛttaṃ kurvatām upanandādīnāṃ sānandānām api vilambāśaṅkā-śaṅku-saṅkulānāṃ
GK19gu05-06u:578: harer mātā bhaktaṃ tad-avadhi na bhuṅkte tad-anugās
GK19gu05-06u:580: kim anyad vaktavyaṃ vrajam anugataṃ yat paśu-kulaṃ
GK19gu05-06u:581: vanasthaṃ yad vā tan-nikhilam iha śiryad vilapati // iti // GC_2,6.1 //
GK19gu05-06u:582: [3] atha kutaścin manaḥ-stha-saṃkocataḥ samprati prati-gamanād viramya bhāvi-līlā-sūcana-devarṣi-vacana-smaraṇāt
GK19gu05-06u:583: tad-eva ca niyamya sahamānatāṃ vahann api tad-evaṃ niśamya samyag-utsukatayā gamyam
GK19gu05-06u:584: eveti manaḥ punaḥ saṅgamya so'ayaṃ vraja-prāṇa-vrajaḥ svāgrajaṃ raho nirvyājaṃ vyājahāra,- æārya /
GK19gu05-06u:586: ahaṃ punar vrajam eva vrajāni' iti /
GK19gu05-06u:588: - bhrātar bhavantaṃ vinā mama sarvaṃ vināśam āyātīti na mayā kim api syāt /
GK19gu05-06u:591: [6] sa uvāca,- yadūnugrasenānugatān vidhāya drutam ubhābhyām evāvābhyāṃ gokulaṃ gantavyam /
GK19gu05-06u:592: tad idaṃ mayāpi bhavyaṃ nivedayaitavyam āsit,
GK19gu05-06u:593: diṣṭyā svayam eva diṣṭyā tad uṭṭaṅkitam /
GK19gu05-06u:594: [7] atha śrī-kṛṣṇas tena sākaṃ śrī-vasudeva-vinā-kṛta-yadu-kula-virājamāna-yadu-rāja-sahāyāṃ gatvā kṣaṇād avasaraṃ ca matvā tad idaṃ nivedana-mudrayā
GK19gu05-06u:600: rāja-mahāśayāś ca nija-rājāsanam evāsanaṃ vidhāya yathā-pūrvaṃ bhavatāṃ parva vitanitatāraḥ /
GK19gu05-06u:603: kiṃ tu mama vṛndāvanam eva sukha-vṛndāya kalpate' iti /
GK19gu05-06u:604: [10] tad evam avadhāya mukhāvalokanaṃ vyatividhāya satsu sabhāsatsu vikadru-nāmā yadu-bṛddhaḥ samṛddha-kṣobham ācacakṣe,
GK19gu05-06u:605: - pūrvam asmākam ekaḥ kaṃsaka eva dhvaṃsaka āsīt /
GK19gu05-06u:606: tad-balād anye punar asmābhir na gaṇyeṣu kṛtāḥ,
GK19gu05-06u:607: bhavatā pramāpite tu tasmin pracura-pramāṇas tad-vidhā jātāḥ,
GK19gu05-06u:608: yato jarāsandhādayas tat-sambandhāhita-nirbandhāḥ koṭayaḥ prasārita-śastra-koṭayaḥ santi /
GK19gu05-06u:609: tasmād bhavan-mātrāśraya-praṇayanīya-prāṇa-trāṇa-yātrā yadavaḥ svayaṃ yathāvad avasthāpyantāṃ saṃsthāpyantāṃ vā /
GK19gu05-06u:610: [11] kiṃ ca æasyās tvām aṣṭamo garbhaḥ' [bhā 10.1.34] iti gīr-vāṇa-vāṇī-sandarbha-sākṣitayā bhavān asmākam eva satyam apatyam,
GK19gu05-06u:611: na tu go-paty-adhipānām ity asmat-pratyavasthāpanam eva bhavatā pratyham ācaraṇīyam /
GK19gu05-06u:612: teṣām apakāra-kārakaś ca kaścana samprati bhātīti yathā-bhavyaṃ syāt tathā vyavahartavyam iti kim adhikaṃ marma-vyañjanayā sādhūnāṃ śatrujitsu parama-dharmavitsu /
GK19gu05-06u:613: [12] atha tad etad anatikramyaṃ niśamya samyag vācaṃ saṃyamya durmanā iva tasmād
GK19gu05-06u:614: apagamya śrī-vasudeva-devakībhyāṃ dharmyaṃ harmyam āgamya śrī-rāmeṇa samam eva tāv anu nivedayāmāsa,
GK19gu05-06u:619: [15] atha tad-etad avadhārya tau tūṣñīkām evāpuṣñītām /
GK19gu05-06u:620: tau hi pūrvam ugrasena-mukuṭa-bandham anu tad-vacana-pravandham ākarṇya vaivarṇyam evāsannau staḥ /
GK19gu05-06u:621: yaḥ khalv avyabhicāritayā vaiśampāyanādibhir api hari-vaṃṣādiṣu pracārita evāsti;
GK19gu05-06u:624: jānāte sma ca tāv asya manovṛttaṃ yad vraja-gamane labdha-saṅgamane sarvam asau vismaratīti /
GK19gu05-06u:626: - ætataḥ parihṛtāv eva cira-labdha-śvāsa-rūpābhyāṃ yuvābhyām āvām' iti tatrākrūrasya jananyā ca vicārataḥ krūram idaṃ proktam,
GK19gu05-06u:628: tarhi vraja evāyam astīti gamanaṃ vāsya kathaṃ nirodha-viṣayīkriyate ?' iti /
GK19gu05-06u:629: [17] atha sarve tasyā mukhaṃ paśyantaś ciraṃ vimṛśya tasthuḥ /
GK19gu05-06u:630: [18] tad-evaṃ sati punar vivikta-mitābhyāṃ rāmājitābhyām akṣīṇam aṣaḍa-kṣīṇam idaṃ nirṇiktaṃ viviktam,
GK19gu05-06u:631: - tad idam āvābhyāṃ saralatayā param anayor guru-caraṇayor niveditam /
GK19gu05-06u:632: tat punar amūbhāṃ svāniṣṭaṃ vitarkya pratyādiṣṭaṃ gurvājñālaṃghananṃ tu na maṅgalāya kalpeta /
GK19gu05-06u:633: yad-ājñā-pālanāya parama-maryādaḥ sa khalu raghu-varyaḥ prājyaṃ rājyam api parityajya nava-bhāryayā saha rākṣasa-caryābhīṣaṇam api vanaṃ bāḍham avagāḍhaṃ cakāra /
GK19gu05-06u:634: tad-ājñā-laṃghanasya parāmṛśyate ca phalam- jarāsandhādayas tv asmat-sambandhena kṛtānusandhe vraje'py utpātaṃ pātayiṣyantīti prastutam astu tāvad aprastutam anyad anyad api,
GK19gu05-06u:635: tasmāc śrī-vrajeśa-caraṇa-samādhānam eva sāmprataṃ sāmpratam iti /
GK19gu05-06u:636: [19] tad-evaṃ mantraṃ vidhāya śrī-vrajeśituranasāṃ samūha sannidhāya tābhyāṃ tasya parisaraḥ samājagme /
GK19gu05-06u:637: samāgamya ca praṇamya samyagāsanam āsthitayos tayo rāma eva tasmin sadasi yad vṛttaṃ tat pravṛttaṃ cakre /
GK19gu05-06u:638: [20] tatra svayaṃ kṛṣṇas tu pitṛ-pitṛvyādīn api sa-vinayaṃ paśyan kiñcid vihasann iva tasya śeṣam āha sma,- hanta/
GK19gu05-06u:639: kādācitkīm ākāśa-vāṇīṃ pramāṇīkṛtya mayi nija-devakī-putratām api te sūcayanti,
GK19gu05-06u:640: tad-antargataṃ sva-mataṃ kāraṇaṃ tu nāvatārayanti iti /
GK19gu05-06u:641: [21] athaitāvat kathitavati madhukaṇṭhe snigdhakaṇṭhaś cintayati sma,
GK19gu05-06u:642: - vastutaḥ khalv ayam anugatācintya-śaktitayā śrī-devakyāṃ catur-bhuja-rūpena śrĪ-yośodāyāṃ tu dvi-bhuja-rūpena sphurati sma æphalena phala-kāraṇam anumīyate' iti nyāyena /
GK19gu05-06u:644: tadā tu śrī-yośodāyāṃ sphuritaṃ dvi-bhuja-rūpam eva catur-bhuja-rūpam antarbhūtaṃ vidhāya tatrāvirbhūveti pūrva-campūm anu (3.102)
GK19gu05-06u:646: tat tu na pūrvam ubhayatrāpi jñātam āsīt iti /
GK19gu05-06u:648: - kathaṃ te svayam api kāraṇam avatārayeyuḥ ?
GK19gu05-06u:649: avatārite tu tasmin vasudevenāpahṛtāpatyasya go-paty adipasya nyāyaḥ satyaḥ syād iti /
GK19gu05-06u:652: - tac-chrutvā tu vraja-nṛpatir bahir avihataṃ vihasya tad anyathā adhyavasyati sma,
GK19gu05-06u:653: æasyās tvām aṣṭamo garbho hantā yāṃ vahase'budha' [bhā 10.1.34] iti
GK19gu05-06u:655: ækiṃ mayā hatayā manda jātaḥ khalu tavānta-kṛt /
GK19gu05-06u:656: yatra kva vā pūrva-śatrur mā hiṃsīḥ kṛpanān bṛthā //'[bhā10.4.12]
GK19gu05-06u:658: avyalīkatā-paryavasita-bhāṣiṇānakadundhubhinā ca māṃ prati nirdvandvam ittham evoktam,
GK19gu05-06u:659: ædiṣṭyā bhrātaḥ pra-vayasa idānīm aprajasya te /
GK19gu05-06u:660: prajāīśāyā nivṛttasya prajā yat samapadyata //' [bhā 10.5.23] iti /
GK19gu05-06u:661: tasmān nūnaṃ æprāg ayaṃ vasudevasyakvacij jātas tavātmajaḥ' [bhā 10.8.14] iti māṃ prati vyañjita-tattva-vargasya gargasya khalv idaṃ prapañcanam evāntaḥ kāraṇam udañcati /
GK19gu05-06u:662: [24] bhavatu, pitroḥ punar idaṃ sukha-samvidam eva tanute,
GK19gu05-06u:663: yan nija-putraṃ prati dhanyāḥ putra-bhāvanām ācarantīti /
GK19gu05-06u:664: [25] viśeṣataś cānakadundhubhinā mama taj-janyā ca bhavaj-jananyā na dvaitam astīti tais tad bhadram evocyate / kiṃ tu,
GK19gu05-06u:665: yātra syād asurād bhītiḥ sā tatra viraha-jvarāt /
GK19gu05-06u:666: bhāvad vayaṃ bhavaty evety ākulaṃ suta manmanaḥ // GC_2,6.2 //
GK19gu05-06u:667: [26] bhavatu, tathāpy eṣām eva sāhāyyaṃ kāryam,
GK19gu05-06u:668: yataḥ sarvajñānāṃ matam avadhārya kāryam etad vicārya khalu mayā kaṃsa-badhāya tavāgamanaṃ na visraṃsitam /
GK19gu05-06u:669: śrūyate hi - pūrvaṃ muni-hitāya daśarathenābhnava-tanayasya rākṣasa-kṣayāya prasthāpanam;
GK19gu05-06u:670: yaḥ khalv anyadā tad vana-gamana-kṣaṇa eva kṣīṇa-prāṇatām avāpa iti kṣaṇaṃ rodanaṃ viṣṭabhya tam etaṃ bāhubhyām avaṣṭabhy ca tad etan mukham īkṣāmāsa /
GK19gu05-06u:671: [27] tataḥ sa caiṣa tam enaṃ sacamānaḥ sa-gadgadaṃ jagāda,- tāta /
GK19gu05-06u:672: duṣṭā naṣṭā eva bhaviṣyantīti na tatra sandihyatām /
GK19gu05-06u:673: tathaiva hi daiva-phalaṃ mama tāta-caraṇeṣu vargaśa eva gargaḥ prati-ñātavān asti /
GK19gu05-06u:674: kadācin mayi caikānte vanānte devarṣi-varya iti /
GK19gu05-06u:675: tathā mama ca vāsas tāta-mahāśayānām upāsanamaya eva sampatsyate,
GK19gu05-06u:679: ete tu suhṛda iti jñātibhiḥ suhṛdāṃ khalv etādṛśa eva bhedaḥ /
GK19gu05-06u:680: suhṛtsu tad-dhitāya kadācid vāsaḥ sadā tu jñātiṣu tad-āloka-sukhāya bhavati iti /
GK19gu05-06u:681: [28] evam uktavati rāmānuje rāma-nāmāpi svaṃ tat-sadṛśam eva parāmṛśann āha sma,
GK19gu05-06u:682: - pitur yuvābhyāṃ snigdhābhyāṃ poṣitau jvālitau bhṛśam āvām iti kiṃ vaktavyam;
GK19gu05-06u:683: yataḥ pitror ātmano'py abhyadhikā prītir ātmajeṣu bhavati iti /
GK19gu05-06u:684: [29] atha kṛṣṇaś ca tad eva sthāpayan prāha sma,
GK19gu05-06u:686: asya ca śrī-man-mad-agrajasya bhavān eva dharmataḥ pitā; yataḥ-
GK19gu05-06u:687: sa pitā sā ca jananī yau puṣñītāṃ sva-putravat /
GK19gu05-06u:688: śiśūn bandhubhir utsṛṣṭān akalpaiḥ poṣa-rakṣaṇe // [bhā 10.45.22] iti /
GK19gu05-06u:690: kiṃ tu suhṛdām eṣāṃ sukham abhimukhaṃ vidhāya śrī-caraṇam āgamisyāmaḥ /
GK19gu05-06u:694: tathā vidheyaṃ yathā bhavad-vyatirekād ekākitayā mātā mā tāpaṃ yāsīt /
GK19gu05-06u:698: - tataḥ sarvam api gokulam utsannatām āpannaṃ syāt /
GK19gu05-06u:700: - tarhi sarvam api vrajaṃ nikaṭaṃ ghaṭayiṣyāmaḥ /
GK19gu05-06u:702: - sampraty asmākaṃ bahulāḥ pratyahaṃ saṃkhyādhikaya-pratyataḥ suṣṭhu bahulā jātāḥ /
GK19gu05-06u:704: gāvaś cāsmākaṃ kula-devya iti tā eva sevyatām arhanti /
GK19gu05-06u:706: māṃ vinā tu byartham iti samarthanīyam,
GK19gu05-06u:707: tarhi ca mat-prāṇā eva tā iti tā eva prāṇanīyāḥ /
GK19gu05-06u:711: tatrāstām asmat-sāmīpyam asmad-asāmīpyataś ca bhavad-avasthānaṃ yady asmat-saṃbandhaṃ vinā labdha-sandhaṃ bhavet tarhy eva kṛcchraṃ narcchet
GK19gu05-06u:712: gūḍha-puruṣa-dvāreṇa jñāte hy asmat-saṃbandhe jarāsandhādayas ta ete kaṃsa-van na bhayānubandhā iti chala-balam ekam ekaṃ na prasthāpayiṣyanti
GK19gu05-06u:713: kiṃ tv akṣauhiṇībhir dravantaḥ sarvaṃ vrajam apy upadrāvayiṣyanti /
GK19gu05-06u:714: tasmād asmābhir yuṣmābhiś ca gopayitavya eva gandhaś ca vyati-saṃbandhasya;
GK19gu05-06u:715: ete ca mayā yādavā durgāntare davayitavyāḥ;
GK19gu05-06u:716: bhavantas tv asaṃkhyā na tathā kartuṃ śakyāḥ /
GK19gu05-06u:719: tasmāt teṣāṃ durga-vad-asmad-audāsīnyam eva bhavatāṃ rakṣāyāṃ prāvīṇyam arhati /
GK19gu05-06u:720: [38] kiṃ tu tāvad eva tad vidheyam,
GK19gu05-06u:721: yāvat sarva-vipakṣa-pakṣāpakṣayaṃ vidhāya svayam eva śrī-mad-vrajam āvrajāmaḥ /
GK19gu05-06u:722: āvrajite ca tasmin na punar anyatra vrajanam api syāt,
GK19gu05-06u:723: yato nirupadhi-sneha-vyagra-bhavad-agrima-sva-jana-varga-darśana-sukha-mātra phala-pātratayā nirupādhir asau puruṣārthaḥ kathaṃ bādhitaḥ syāt
GK19gu05-06u:724: tad-evaṃ vyasya yan nivedutaṃ tad tad evedaṃ samasya nivedayāmi,
GK19gu05-06u:725: yāta yūyaṃ vrajaṃ tāta vayaṃ ca sneha-duḥkhitān /
GK19gu05-06u:726: jñātīn vo draṣṭum eṣyāmo vidhāya suhṛdāṃ sukham // [bhā 10.45.23] iti /
GK19gu05-06u:727: [39] tad-etat-paryantaṃ madhukaṇṭhaḥ procya bhrātaram avalocya prāha sma,
GK19gu05-06u:728: - atra ætāta' iti nijāntaḥ-sthāpita-putratā-bhāvanāyā yogyam eva sambodhanam; æjñātīn' iti,
GK19gu05-06u:729: tatrāpi æsneha-duḥkhitān' iti snehasya niravadhikatvāt prati-kṣaṇaṃ didṛkṣuṣu tan-mukhyeṣu teṣv evāvasthānaṃ prati-kṣaṇam eva sva-vīkṣaṇa-dānaṃ ca vivakṣitam /
GK19gu05-06u:730: ævayam' iti æasmado dvayoś ca' iti pāṇinīya-smaraṇād astu tāvan mama vārtā,
GK19gu05-06u:731: kiṃ tv āvāṃ dvāv apy eṣyāva iti vyañjitam /
GK19gu05-06u:732: ædraṣṭum' iti teṣām ivātmano'pi tad-darśana-mātra-puruṣārthatā samarthitā /
GK19gu05-06u:734: viboddhum arhati' [bhā 10.14.6] ity atra bodha-viṣayī-bhavitum iti-vad-darśana-viṣayī-bhavitum ity arthāntare'pi tad-vad eva siddhāntitam;
GK19gu05-06u:735: æsuhṛdām' iti yadūnām ajñātitvam upakāryatva-mātraṃ ca dhvani-pātraṃ kṛtam
GK19gu05-06u:736: / tatra ca æsukhaṃ vidhāya' iti ktvā-prayogeṇa sāvadhika-nirdeśāt tad-bhayādi-nāśanānataraṃ punas tad anapekṣatvam api lakṣitam iti /
GK19gu05-06u:740: - vraja-rājaś ca tadīya-vāco-yukti-racanam anabhirucitam api bāḍham ucitam iti matvā manasi sva-lalāṭaṃ hatvā vāṣpa-spṛṣṭam aspaṣṭam ācaṣṭa,
GK19gu05-06u:743: - tāṃ prati ca yatheṣṭa-praṇāma-pūrvakaṃ nijeṣṭa-dvārā mayedaṃ sandeṣṭavyam iti procya sva-hasta-lipibhis tat patraṃ virocya śrīdāma-hasta-vinyastaṃ kṛtavān /
GK19gu05-06u:744: [43] śrīdāmā ca śrī-vraja-rāja-śuśrūṣāyāṃ kṛtānusandhas tan-mukhabandham atīva tad-dīnan-manyatānubandham anusandhāya taṃ vihāya nivedyam eva sa-gadgadaṃ gadati sma,
GK19gu05-06u:745: - yathā samprati vayaṃ duṣṭa-janāt kaṣṭam āśaṃkya spaṣṭam eva nāyāsyāmaḥ;
GK19gu05-06u:746: kiṃ tu śrīmat-pitṛ-caraṇa-paricaraṇa-prabhāvān mamāṣaḍa-kṣīṇam akṣīṇam āgamanaṃ pratyaham api vidyata eva /
GK19gu05-06u:748: ādye'hni kṣīra-bhaktaṃ ghana-dadhi-valitā roṭikā tasya paścāt-
GK19gu05-06u:750: mātar mahyaṃ nikāyye mahati rasayate paryaveṣi tvayā yan
GK19gu05-06u:751: na svapnas tan na vā tat sphuraṇa-mayam iti smaryatāṃ kiṃ tu satyam // GC_2,6.3 //
GK19gu05-06u:753: yavann āśnāsi mātas tvam iti niśamaye hanta nāśnāni tāvad
GK19gu05-06u:754: yady aśnāmīva tarhy apy anubhavad asu me ye'savaḥ śoṣamīyuḥ /
GK19gu05-06u:755: goṣṭhaṃ gacchāni paśyāny api nija-jananīṃ tad-vidhām evam eva
GK19gu05-06u:756: hy udyat tejaḥ-prakāśād ripu-gaṇam acirād ut-sahiṣye vijetum // iti // GC_2,6.4 //
GK19gu05-06u:757: [44] atha tad-etan niśamya samyag- asrāvilaṃ sandeśa-haraś ca vyājahāra,
GK19gu05-06u:758: - satyaṃ śrī-vrajeśvarī-caraṇāś ca svapna-vad idaṃ sāmprata-bhavad-bhojanādikaṃ sa-rodanaṃ vadanti sma /
GK19gu05-06u:759: bhavad-duḥkham āśaṃkya svābhojanam api gopayanti sma iti /
GK19gu05-06u:760: [45] atha tad-etad avadhārya sāścaryatayā sthiteṣu teṣu vraja-mahīkṣīd-ārdra-vīkṣitam ācacakṣe,
GK19gu05-06u:761: - bhavataḥ prema-vaśyānāṃ vayasyānām eṣāṃ vartane kā vārtā ?
GK19gu05-06u:763: - śrīman-mātṛvad eva te cāmī mamepsita-sakhi-janā vīkṣyayā mām upalapsyante;
GK19gu05-06u:764: kiṃ tu mātur-vatsalatā-svabhāvatayā kadācid anyathā-prathā bhāsiṣyate,
GK19gu05-06u:767: - prathamatas tāvad eta iva gāvaḥ katham etāvatīṃ prakriyāṃ śrāvaṇīṃ kurvantu ?
GK19gu05-06u:769: - yady api tāsv api mama tathā-sphūrtir-jūrtim apanayet tathāpi prakārāntaram api bahir-vṛtti-samādhānāya vidhāsyāmi /
GK19gu05-06u:770: yathā- tāsāṃ gandhānu-sandhānam eva pradhānaṃ rava-gaṇa-śravaṇaṃ ca;
GK19gu05-06u:773: kṛta-man-muralī-khuralīkatayā ca tathā subalaś cāyaṃ bala-vasanāvalambatayā tadīya-śṛṃga-saṃgitayā
GK19gu05-06u:775: tataś ca mamākhila-guṇa-nidhaya ete sarve'py anayoḥ prati-nidhayaḥ syur yatra vanyāś
GK19gu05-06u:776: ca te dhanyāḥ sarvābhi-vādyā mṛga-nagādyā mat-sphūrti-pūrtim āgaccheyur iti sarvam
GK19gu05-06u:778: [49] atha nija-paricārakān śūdrābhīra-kumārakān hata-vicārakān niśāmya vaivaśyād vaiśyābhīra-rāji śāmyad-vacana-śaktibhāji svayam eva so'yam asra-toya-dharaḥ prāha sma,
GK19gu05-06u:779: ( mama sakhīyamānānām eṣām akhilānāṃ teṣām iva yadyapi gatis tathāpi tātānugatis tu viśeṣataḥ stutim āsīdati iti /
GK19gu05-06u:780: [50] atha madhumaṅgalam api tad idaṃ sneha-saṅgatam āha,( hanta/
GK19gu05-06u:782: yad-bhagavatī-sevāṃ man-maṅgalāya mat-pratinidhitayā kurvāṇāḥ punas tad-apūrva-jananāt pūrvavat tad-akharva-parvaṇe sampatsyante iti /
GK19gu05-06u:784: viśeṣatas tat-tad-guṇa-vāsitau vidhāyānyān api yathā-nyāyaṃ nijālaṃkaraṇādinālaṃkṛtya
GK19gu05-06u:785: sevādikāriṇaṃ ca yathāvad ādṛtya kṛtya-viśeṣān śrī-mat-pitṛ-caraṇeṣu gocaratāṃ nināya;
GK19gu05-06u:786: nītvā ca tad-anujñāṃ gṛhītvā svayaṃ tatraiva sthitvā mantra-sadanād-bahiḥ sthitān māthura-vipra-janān antar-nitvā tad-dvārā sarvānn eva yadūn
GK19gu05-06u:788: [52] te ca śrī-vasudeva-naradeva-pramukhās tatraiva sukhād āgatāḥ,
GK19gu05-06u:789: āgamya ca ramya-paricchadādinā tān abhyarcya cānuvrajya ca carcyamāna-tad-bhadratayā puramayāmāsuḥ /
GK19gu05-06u:790: [53] sa tu yaśasvī svayam asvīkṛta-rājyatayā kim api tatratyaṃ tān praty-anapavarjya
GK19gu05-06u:791: kiṃ tu prāg-vali-valita-bali-kaṃsa-hṛta-dhṛta-kupya-bhājanāni yāni tāny eva visarjya
GK19gu05-06u:792: keśavaḥ kevalatāyāṃ mithaḥ kṣubhitatā-bhītas tair eva saha śrī-vrajam ahanīyān anujñāpya
GK19gu05-06u:793: manasi kayāpy avasthayā vyāpyamānaḥ puram ājagāma,
GK19gu05-06u:795: {54} vrajeśvaras tu pralīna-manastāyām api jīvan-mukta-vad eva saṃskāra-vaśād idaṃ jagāda,( vatsa/
GK19gu05-06u:799: [55] atha sva-sambandhād adhika-duḥkhānubandhād āśaṃkamānaḥ saṃkarṣaṇaḥ sa-dhairyaṃ
GK19gu05-06u:800: sarvān anujñāpya śīghra-gatyā sva-bhrātaraṃ prāpya kvacid ekāntam anuyāpya nija-nija-bāhubhyāṃ
GK19gu05-06u:801: parasparaṃ grīvāṃ paridhāpya tena saha ruroda /
GK19gu05-06u:805: taṃ kṛṣṇaṃ taṃ ca rāmaṃ tam api paśupati-ksmā-patiṃ tāṃś ca gopān /
GK19gu05-06u:806: śrīdāmādyāṃś ca tāṃs tān api ca tad-anugān navya-viccheda-bhīter
GK19gu05-06u:807: antaḥ smṛtvā mad-antar-virasa-vaśatayā sarvam arvāg jahāti // GC_2,6.5 //
GK19gu05-06u:808: [56} tad-evam uṭṭṃkayan-madhukaṇṭhaḥ śrī-vrajādhipādīnām ādhim avadhāya punar abhidadhe,(
GK19gu05-06u:809: yaḥ svāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ purā tṛṣṇāṃ vardhayāmāsa dhṛṣṇajam /
GK19gu05-06u:810: sa sākṣād bhavatām aṃke svaṃ keliṃ vahati prabho // GC_2,6.6 //
GK19gu05-06u:811: [57] atha śrī-kṛṣṇaś ca tac-caraṇāravindaṃ śirasā vindan sa-nirvedaṃ niveditavān,(
GK19gu05-06u:814: katham api nijam aṅgaṃ vyādhinā duḥkhadaṃ syat
GK19gu05-06u:815: tad api na hi tad-aṅgī tyaktum icchet kadāpi // GC_2,6.7 //
GK19gu05-06u:819: [58] tad-evaṃ prātaḥ-kathāṃ madhukaṇṭhaḥ samāpya śrī-mādhava-pada-sīmni rādhikā-sadasi kathayāmāsa,(
GK19gu05-06u:820: [59] ye khalu tasya vrajāvrajanāya vyañjitā vighnās te sarve prāg-ukta-lajjā-nighnā eva mantavyāḥ /
GK19gu05-06u:821: tad-eva purastād vyañjayan mathurāyāś calantaṃ subalaṃ balānujaḥ sva-vallabhārocaka-vācika-valitaṃ cakāra / yathā(
GK19gu05-06u:823: dharmyaṃ me nāsti kiṃcit tad api sa-vayasaḥ śrūyatāṃ man-nivedyam /
GK19gu05-06u:824: yuṣmākaṃ yātisetur mayi ratir atulā sā tu māṃ hrepayantī
GK19gu05-06u:825: tat-tulyāsakti-riktaṃ hnuta-tanum akaron nāsmi dūraḥ kadāpi // GC_2,6.9 //
GK19gu05-06u:826: puryām asyāṃ yad asmi prakaṭam api hi taṃ hanta kuryāṃ kathaṃ tat
GK19gu05-06u:827: kiṃ tu cchāyā-sadṛkṣaḥ sphuṭam iha viharet tatra tu svena nityam /
GK19gu05-06u:828: āveśo yatra yasya sphurati sa niyataṃ tatra bhāti svayaṃ yat
GK19gu05-06u:829: sphūrtiṃ svāṃ so'yam asmīty anubhajati yathā tena nānyena tad-vat // GC_2,6.10 //
GK19gu05-06u:830: somābhe darśa-rātrāv api nija-rucibhiḥ pūrṇimā-bhrāntitas tvaṃ
GK19gu05-06u:833: so'haṃ śiśleṣa tat-tad-vinimita-daśayā yatra citraṃ jagastha // GC_2,6.11 //
GK19gu05-06u:834: somābhe mānam aicchaḥ pratipadi lalite mām ayāsr vanānte
GK19gu05-06u:835: pālyāsīr vāsa-sajjā paricarasi purā rādhayā mām viśākhe /
GK19gu05-06u:836: etad diṃ-mātram uktaṃ bhavad-avagataye jñeyam anyat kathaṃ vā
GK19gu05-06u:837: svapnaṃ tat tat viditvā glapayatha nijakaṃ mānasaṃ mām apīha ? // GC_2,6.12 //
GK19gu05-06u:838: padme bhadre sa-śaivye tritayam api bhavad-rūpam udbhrānta-cittaṃ
GK19gu05-06u:839: mad-viśleṣāt tamālaṃ pari viluṭhitavad yatra tatrāham āsam /
GK19gu05-06u:840: āliṅgan yuṣmad-aṅgāny udanamayam aho yāvad abhyasya tāvat
GK19gu05-06u:841: Kruddhā bṛddhāḥ kutaścid vata yad-upagatās tan na me yāti duḥkham // GC_2,6.13 //
GK19gu05-06u:843: tvām āliṅgyānucu mban giri-vanam anayaṃ tat kathaṃ vyasmaras tvaṃ ?
GK19gu05-06u:844: tatrāgamyātha sarvāḥ kala-kala-virutaṃ yarhi cakrus tadānīṃ
GK19gu05-06u:845: tatrāvāṃ hā yathāsvaṃ pṛthakad apagatau na smarasy eva tac ca // GC_2,6.14 //
GK19gu05-06u:846: svapne yad rādhike tvaṃ mama śayanam ihāpy āśritā rāja-puryāṃ
GK19gu05-06u:847: svapnas tan nasti nūnaṃ parimalitam abhūd yat-tvayā tasya vāsaḥ /
GK19gu05-06u:848: āstāṃ tat spaṣṭam adyāpy anu mad avayavaṃ padminī-ratna-gandhaṃ
GK19gu05-06u:849: Vindann andho'pi lokaḥ smita-śavala-mukhaḥ śīrṣam īṣad dhunīte // GC_2,6.15 //
GK19gu05-06u:851: vṛttaṃ tad-yuṣmākābhiḥ sa-śapatham abhitaḥ pṛcchyatāṃ śyāmalaiva /
GK19gu05-06u:852: yady apy evaṃ tathāpi sphuṭa-gatim acirād āgatiṃ cen-madīyām
GK19gu05-06u:853: īhadhve sarva-vighna-praśamana-racanā syād yadā tarhi kuryām // GC_2,6.16 //
GK19gu05-06u:854: [60] tad-eva etāvat-prathām eva kathāṃ samāpya punar madhukaṇṭhaḥ provāca,(
GK19gu05-06u:855: rādhe so'yaṃ satyavādī tvām alaṃkṛtya śobhate /
GK19gu05-06u:857: ūṣā-niruddha-vad rādhe yayoḥ svāpnaś ca saṅgamaḥ /
GK19gu05-06u:858: ṣākṣād āsīt tayor vā kiṃ viśleṣaḥ sthātum arhati ? // GC_2,6.18 //
